channel.title: Norway on Bird’s Eye View
channel.description: Recent content in Norway on Bird’s Eye View

item.title: Tromso, Norway
item.description: Tromso, Norway Travel date December 2022 Check other cities in Norway The Most Magical Place on Earth Ever thought about vacationing to one of the most northern points of the world? Well, be sure to consider Tromso, Norway. I can not say enough incredible things about this small Scandinavian town. It is like driving around in a postcard. Every where you look, you are in nature’s paradise. Welcome to Tromso, Norway.
